currentRole.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: I led frontend PLG initiatives for TrustCloud (Kintent), including reusable paywall frameworks and self-serve onboarding flows.
I single-handedly built a React-based TV WebApp for WebOS, integrating with native C++ modules and designing a Dpad-compatible UI system.
I contributed core healthcare features to Headlamp and Transcarent using ReactQuery, GraphQL, and Next.js.

journey: My journey as a developer has been a mix of curiosity, grit, and continuous learning. I started by writing basic web apps and quickly found myself drawn toward crafting intuitive user interfaces and performant frontends. Over the years, I evolved from being a hands-on developer to leading cross-functional teams and delivering high-impact features. Whether it’s building TV apps on WebOS with native C++ integration, leading PLG initiatives for SaaS platforms, or fine-tuning app performance with profiling tools — I’ve embraced every challenge with ownership and empathy. I take pride in writing clean, maintainable code and believe that great software is built through collaboration, iteration, and a clear understanding of user needs.
